input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling PMCC Jersey'
  - Name='Mens Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Core Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Base Layer'
  - Name='Women's Pedal Mafia Cycling PMCC Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling PMCC Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Light Jacket'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Brevet Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Classic Long Sleeve Jersey Men's'
  - Name='Rapha Men's EF Pro Team Training 2025 Jersey'
  - Name='Trek Men's Rapha Core Cycling Shirt'
  - Name='ASSOS Equipe Rsr Jersey Superleger S9'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Jersey'
  - Name='Men's Classic Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Jersey S11'
  - Name='ASSOS Uma Gt Spring Fall Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Tour Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Elite Escape Graphic Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='GORE WEAR Men's Spirit Moire Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pac Range Aero Mesh Cargo Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling PMCC Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a cycling jersey by Pedal Mafia, likely similar use and construction but possibly different features or style from the 'Core Jersey'.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Mens Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Name matches closely indicating same or very similar core cycling jersey product, likely same features and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar 'Core' cycling jersey but long sleeve variant; similar function with some differences in sleeve length and potentially fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Core Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Core jersey designation but long sleeve style; similar product family but differs in sleeve length which affects construction and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Base Layer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Base layer is typically a garment worn under jersey, different silhouette and construction; less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women's Pedal Mafia Cycling PMCC Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar cycling jersey from same brand but designed for women; similar function and construction, gender-targeted fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling PMCC Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts are a lower body cycling wear, very different product type and construction compared to jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Pro Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same reasoning as above; a different garment type focused on shorts, not jerseys.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Light Jacket
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Related upper body cycling apparel in the 'Core' line, but a jacket vs. a jersey; different construction and utility.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Cycling Pro Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey by same brand but 'Pro' model and women's fit; similar product type but likely different features or performance level.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Pro Team Training Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-quality men's cycling jersey with similar function but different brand and potentially higher performance focus.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Brevet Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another performance cycling jersey from reputable brand; same category and function but different brand and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Classic Long Sleeve Jersey Men's
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey similar in function but differing sleeve length and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's EF Pro Team Training 2025 Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical, team training jersey with similar cycling use, but potentially more specialized features and different brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Trek Men's Rapha Core Cycling Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a core cycling shirt likely similar use, but includes 'shirt' which may imply different construction or style compared to jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS Equipe Rsr Jersey Superleger S9
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium cycling jersey similar function but different brand and potentially more race-specific design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey by well-known brand, similar purpose but different model and potentially different construction/materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Classic Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic name indicates similar garment type, but lack of brand or features reduces certainty of match.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal jersey designed for cooler conditions; same general type but different use case and likely fabric construction.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Seasonal cycling jersey designed for spring/fall; similar product type but designed for specific conditions.
